name: Hornbill
description: Admin tools for the Simple Tracer app.

KEY.description: This is the key for encrypting user passwords, refer to setup docs for more info.

AIRTABLE_KEY.description: This is your Airtable API key, refer to setup docs for more info.

AIRTABLE_BASE.description: The Airtable Base ID for your Airtable, refer to setup docs for more info.

TWILIO_ACCOUNT_SID.description: Your Twilio account SID, refer to setup docs for more info.

TWILIO_AUTH_TOKEN.description: Your Twilio auth token, refer to setup docs for more info.

TWILIO_NOTIFY_SERVICE_SID.description: Your Twilio's notify service SID, refer to setup docs for more info.
